name: Mammogram
title: Mammogram
description: The purpose of this value set is a harmonized representation of mammogram codes from across the various quality programs.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes that identify a mammogram.),(Data Element Scope: DiagnosticReport, Procedure),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes codes that identify a mammogram.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)

concept.display: Screening mammography, bilateral (2-view study of each breast), including computer-aided detection (cad) when performed
Diagnostic mammography, including computer-aided detection (cad) when performed; bilateral
Diagnostic mammography, including computer-aided detection (cad) when performed; unilateral
Screening, diagnostic, film, digital or digital breast tomosynthesis (3d) mammography results documented and reviewed

contains.display: Screening, diagnostic, film, digital or digital breast tomosynthesis (3d) mammography results documented and reviewed
